hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Prophet (ﷺ) said (that Allah said):"For every good deed that the son of Adam does, he will have (the reward of) ten the like thereof, except for fasting. It is for Me and I shall reward for it

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى أَبِي صَالِحٍ فِي هَذَا الْحَدِيثِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the Different Reports from Abu Salih in this Narration
